title: Leaders of E.U., Canada and Other Countries React to U.S.-led Attack on Iran
summary_full: Governments around the world urged restraint after the United States and Israel launched a major assault, and Iran vowed retaliation.
summary_public: Governments around the world urged restraint after the United States and Israel launched a major assault, and Iran vowed retaliation.

IL.label: negative
IL.evidence: Israel launched a major assault, and Iran vowed retaliation
